§ Daniel Supernaul (Fediverse, Who is Who)

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

**Daniel Supernault**, who goes by the nickname **@dansup**, is a notable person on the Fediverse because —

• [[fediverse/software/pixelfed]] — Fediverse software focused photos and images,
• [[fediverse/fedidb]] — a service which gathers, tracks, and reports various metrics about the Fediverse.

§§ Sysop

**Daniel Supernault** is the **system operator** (**sysop**) for the following Fediverse servers:

• ``pixelfed.social`` ([[fediverse/software/pixelfed]])

§§ Fediverse IDs

**Daniel Supernault**'s [[fediverse-id]]'s are:

• @dansup@mastodon.social
• @dansup@pixelfed.social
